document.full_text: pro-democracy activists will face an uphill fight to convince a u.s. court that baidu inc and china censored them over the internet and should be punished.
document.title: analysis: uphill fight for baidu, china censorship lawsuit
lines_and_colors: pro-democracy activists will face an uphill fight to convince a u.s. court that baidu inc and china censored them over the internet and should be punished.
